title: The only ppl that "like" seeing ziggs bot lane are ppl that dont play bot lane

replies.body: rather go against a ziggs than cait or vayne.  hes not that bad, but i play aram alot tho so i have lots if experience dodging skillshots
I think it's more people that are bored with the current state of Bottom Lane.
i play support and i have no problem with it.

> [{quoted}](name=ChaddyFantome,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=EGkqfEfB,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-01-04T00:03:55.154+0000)
>
> i play support and i have no problem with it.

I should have specified adcs and supports who play actual supports and not bot lane mages support, those like ziggs because it makes their ap cheese even stronger.

> [{quoted}](name=RexSaur,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=EGkqfEfB,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-01-04T00:05:37.253+0000)
>
> I should have specified adcs and supports who play actual supports and not bot lane mages support, those like ziggs because it makes their ap cheese even stronger.

nice assumptions there.

Level 7 Mastery Lulu support player here.

Please try harder.

I play ADC and tank supports and I don't mind it.  I Kinda wanna mess around with a trist+ziggs bot lane in normals now.  Its refreshing.  It would be nice if there was a little more diversity in bot lane.  It would also be nice if Riot could smooth out ADC power curves so they could be played more reliably in other lanes too.
{{champion:202}}, {{champion:110}}  (We can't tell em we are secretly ad mages that fit a midlaner type playstyle)
The people who play bot lane Ziggs like seeing Ziggs being played bot lane.
Anything to crap on an ADC makes me happy
